name: Asylum - 8 (Eight) Limited Edition - 11/18
additionalNotes: The Asylum Eight Limited Edition 7 x 70 is a long and hefty, medium strength giant that is handmade by the CLE Cigar Company in Honduras. This celebratory stick marks Asylum Cigarsâ€™ eight anniversary. It is a Honduran puro that features a dark savory maduro wrapper. Each Asylum Eight Limited Edition 7 x 70 is placed in a coffin to protect it and preserve its flavor. This is a limited-edition cigar, only 500 boxes of 20 cigars per box were made.
